attributes.action: Change the way autism  in girls is diagnosed
attributes.additional_details:
I want to see much earlier interventions in the educational systems to prevent  mental health with later diagnosis. Majority  of girls don't get diognosed and slip through the net. We need to change the list of signs 9f adhd and autism schools and care providers have. As in girls this is so very different.  We need to educate teachers to help them  understand even though there are no apparent signs as per this list there is . These are just  some.......
Hyper focus on one set thing
Day dreaming 
In ability to make friends
Masking others
Melt down when they get home due to holding the stress in all day
attributes.background: Autism is  a neurodiverse condition.  All to often people think Autism or adhd is a child running round fidgeting and very hyper. However that's not the same for girls.  Girls with traits of Autism hide how they are feeling . And have the ability to look like they are focusing well in school.

rejection.details:
Diagnosing autism is a clinical matter, but we have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Fund improved neurodiversity diagnosis, identification and support in schools: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565300

Require mandatory training on ASD/ADHD and SEND for teachers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558591
